role.argrole: entity arg0 bows his head to submissively

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (PN 他)) (VP (VP (VV 相信) (NP-OBJ (NN 马克思主义))) (PU ，) (VP (ADVP (AD 也)) (ADVP (AD 就)) (VP (VP (ADVP (AD 完全)) (VP (VV 俯首称臣))) (PU ，) (VP (DVP (VP (ADVP (AD 毫)) (VP (VE 无) (NP-OBJ (NN 保留)))) (DEV 的)) (VP (VV 加以) (IP-OBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 发扬)))))))))
